import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import "./Cart.css"; import CartItemCard from "./CartItemCard"; const Cart = () => { const item={ product:"productID", price:200, name:"adhi", quantity:1, image: "https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--hyccHQb2WY/YOQiaoaAoHI/AAAAAAAAAQI/0QPBjqa-yw0YY43b2UcUvmorQd5zrfH8wCLcBGAsYHQ/s500/riococo-green-starter-bag-custom-made.jpg", } return (

Product

Quantity

Subtotal

{`₹${item.price * item.quantity}`}

 ) } export default Cart
